 The RemPPDescriptor struct describes miscellaneous characteristics of a player proxy (PP) respectively the media player it connects. More...

Typedefs

typedef _RemPPPriv RemPPPriv
 The RemPPPriv struct is (for RemLib) an opaque data structure to store player proxy private data.
typedef RemLibrary *(*) RemPPGetLibraryFunc (RemPPPriv *pp_priv)
 RemLib requests the PLIDs and names of a media player's ploblists.
typedef void(*) RemPPSynchronizeFunc (RemPPPriv *pp_priv, RemPlayerStatus *status)
 RemLib requests the PP to synchronize status to the current player status.
typedef RemPlob *(*) RemPPGetPlobFunc (RemPPPriv *pp_priv, const gchar *pid)
 RemLib requests a RemPlob with a certain PID.
typedef RemStringList *(*) RemPPGetPloblistFunc (RemPPPriv *pp_priv, const gchar *plid)
 RemLib requests the PIDs of the plobs in a certain ploblist.
typedef void(*) RemPPNotifyErrorFunc (RemPPPriv *pp_priv, GError *err)
 RemLib notifies that a crucial error occured.
typedef void(*) RemPPPlayPloblistFunc (RemPPPriv *pp_priv, const gchar *plid)
 RemLib requests the PP to use (the contents of) the ploblist as the new playlist.
typedef RemStringList *(*) RemPPSearchFunc (RemPPPriv *pp_priv, const RemPlob *mask)
 RemLib requests the PIDs of the plobs that equal in the meta information elements set in mask.
typedef void(*) RemPPSimpleControlFunc (RemPPPriv *pp_priv, RemSimpleControlCommand cmd, gint param)
 RemLib requests the PP to do the simple control command command with the parameter param.
typedef void(*) RemPPUpdatePlobFunc (RemPPPriv *pp_priv, const RemPlob *plob)
 RemLib requests the PP to update (on player side) the meta information of a plob.
typedef void(*) RemPPUpdatePloblistFunc (RemPPPriv *pp_priv, const gchar *plid, const RemStringList *pids)
 RemLib requests the PP to update (on player side) the contents of a ploblist.
